item.title: OpenSSL Suite
item.description: Glossary Cipher: (for symmetric enc/dec) one block cipher + one mode of operation. e.g. aes-256-cbc. Cheetsheet Symmetric Enc / Dec 1# enc 2openssl enc -<CIPHER> -pbkdf2 -in <PLAINTEXT_FILE> -out <CIPHERTEXT_FILE> 3 4# dec 5openssl enc -d -<CIPHER> -pbkdf2 -in <CIPHERTEXT_FILE> -out <PLAINTEXT_FILE> copy For a list of supported <CIPHER>: 1# openssl enc -list 2Supported ciphers: 3-aes-128-cbc -aes-128-cfb -aes-128-cfb1 4-aes-128-cfb8 -aes-128-ctr -aes-128-ecb 5-aes-128-ofb -aes-192-cbc -aes-192-cfb 6# etc. copy PK Cert self-sign openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout key.
